content: Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :-------------------------- | :----------: | :------------------------------------------------ | | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | udorLocal | `'date'` | Date of origination in local timezone | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | suffix | `'string'` | Suffix code | | departureAirport | `'string'` | Airport of departure | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | Airport of arrival | | regId | `'string'` | Registration number of aircraft | | activityType | `'string'` | Type of fueling activity (e.g., Refuelling) | | productType | `'string'` | Type of fuel product used (e.g., JetA1) | | fuelEquipmentId | `'string'` | Equipment identification code used for fuelling | | receiptId | `'string'` | Receipt identification number | | deliveryDate | `'datetime'` | Date and time of fuel delivery | | agentCode | `'string'` | Code of the into-plane fueling agent | | supplierCode | `'string'` | Code of the fuel supplier company | | density | `'number'` | Density of the fuel | | densityType | `'string'` | Type of density measurement | | densityUnit | `'string'` | Unit used for measuring the fuel density | | quantity | `'number'` | Amount of fuel delivered | | quantityUnit | `'string'` | Unit used for measuring the fuel quantity | | handlerCode | `'string'` | The supplier that provides fuel services to the airline | | requestingFuelCarrier | `'string'` | The carrier code of the airline requesting fuel | | source | `'string'` | The source system from which fuel milestone data originates | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # PAX Airport Operation Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | flightId | `'string'` | Unique flight id
